attributes.action: Provide support for night industries affected by covid-19 restrictions.
attributes.additional_details: The night industries have been some of the most severely affected industries during the pandemic, most of which have been unable to generate revenue due to restrictions placed upon them by government officials.
attributes.background: Provide financial support to night time industries (such as night clubs, restraunts, pubs, and leisure facilities).

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Let Us Dance - Support nightclubs, dance music events and festivals: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332789

Give further financial support to the Events and Hospitality industry: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329985

It is not clear exactly what you mean by "night industries", but if there are other industries you would like to receive support you could start a new petition requesting support for these industries, but it would need to be clear what industries you want to receive additional support.
